title: Mama Bear's Whiskey Cream Shaving Soap
features: This is a pure and natural shaving soap, that is luxurious and moisturing with added fragrance.
Luxurious Lather that is highly slick and cushioning with wonderful fragrance.
description: Our unmistakably wonderful interpretation of the classic fragrance. Wonderfully luxurious and gentle shaving soap for men that will not dry out your skin. Adds moisturizing glycerin and wonderful fragrances for a shaving experience that is unparalleled. Each soap is luxuriously scented and contain no detergents, surfactants or sulfates. Natural glycerin soap with an additional 20% added glycerin and added fragrance.
